statements: SELECT * FROM employee_assignments WHERE employee_id = 10;
SELECT assignment_date, status FROM employee_assignments WHERE status = 'Active';
SELECT * FROM employee_assignments WHERE assignment_id = 3 AND status = 'Pending';
SELECT employee_id, asset_id FROM employee_assignments WHERE assignment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT assignment_id, return_date FROM employee_assignments WHERE return_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM employee_assignments WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY assignment_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT asset_id, assignment_date, return_date FROM employee_assignments WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY return_date ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT assignment_id, status FROM employee_assignments WHERE assignment_id IN (1, 3, 5, 7, 9)
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(asset_id) AS total_assets FROM employee_assignments GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_assets > 2
SELECT * FROM employee_assignments WHERE assignment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM employee_assignments WHERE employee_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT asset_id, assigned_date FROM employee_assignments WHERE assigned_date >= '2022-01-01' AND assigned_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM employee_assignments WHERE assignment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employees WHERE position = 'Manager' ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM employee_assignments WHERE assigned_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY assigned_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT e.employee_name, e.department, ea.assigned_date FROM employees e JOIN employee_assignments ea ON e.employee_id = ea.employee_id WHERE e.department = 'IT' ORDER BY ea.assigned_date ASC
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(asset_id) AS num_assets_assigned FROM employee_assignments GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(asset_id) > 5 ORDER BY num_assets_assigned DESC
SELECT e.employee_name, e.position FROM employees e WHERE e.department = 'Marketing' AND e.position = 'Manager'
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC, department ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM employee_assignments;
SELECT employee_id, asset_id, assignment_date FROM employee_assignments ORDER BY assignment_date DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name, asset_type FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'Computer';
SELECT e.employee_name, a.asset_name, ea.assignment_date FROM employees e JOIN employee_assignments ea ON e.employee_id = ea.employee_id JOIN assets a ON ea.asset_id = a.asset_id;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'laptop';
SELECT asset_id, asset_name FROM assets ORDER BY asset_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_date FROM employee_assignments WHERE assignment_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, asset_name FROM employees JOIN employee_assignments ON employees.employee_id = employee_assignments.employee_id JOIN assets ON employee_assignments.asset_id = assets.asset_id;
SELECT * FROM employee_assignments;
SELECT employee_name, position FROM employees;
SELECT department_name, manager_id FROM departments ORDER BY department_name DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type, purchase_date FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'Computer';
SELECT employee_id, asset_id, assigned_date, return_date FROM employee_assignments WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY assigned_date ASC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees;
SELECT * FROM assets WHERE asset_type = 'Computer';
SELECT employee_name, asset_name, assigned_date FROM employees JOIN employee_assignments ON employees.employee_id = employee_assignments.employee_id;
SELECT * FROM departments WHERE manager_id IS NOT NULL;

SELECT employee_name, department, asset_name FROM employees JOIN employee_assignments ON employees.employee_id = employee_assignments.employee_id JOIN assets ON employee_assignments.asset_id = assets.asset_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM assets WHERE assigned_employee_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM assignments WHERE assigned_date < '2022-10-01';
SELECT a.asset_name, l.location_name FROM assets a JOIN asset_locations al ON a.asset_id = al.asset_id JOIN locations l ON al.location_id = l.location_id WHERE a.asset_type = 'Computer';
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees ORDER BY employee_id DESC;
SELECT asset_name, asset_type FROM assets WHERE assigned_employee_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(asset_id) AS total_assets FROM assignments GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_assets > 2;
SELECT employee_name, assigned_date FROM employees e JOIN assignments a ON e.employee_id = a.employee_id ORDER BY assigned_date ASC;
